Package fi.tuni.tiko

Class SaveHandler

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.tiko.SaveHandler
public class SaveHandler
extends java.lang.Object
The SaveHandler class handles the saving, loading and resetting of the game. The settings are saved separately.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SaveHandler()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void loadContinueUnlock()
    Loads whether there is an old save already.
    static void loadProgress()
    Loads the game Loads the screen, day, state of the meters and settings.
    static void loadSettings()
    Loads the settings.
    static void resetProgress()
    Resets the game's progress.
    static void saveContinueUnlock()
    Saves whether there is an old save already.
    static void saveProgress()
    Saves the game.
    static void saveSettings()
    Saves the settings.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SaveHandler

      public SaveHandler()

  • Method Details

    • saveProgress

      public static void saveProgress()
      Saves the game. Saves the current screen, current day, state of the meters and settings.

    • loadProgress

      public static void loadProgress()
      Loads the game Loads the screen, day, state of the meters and settings. The default day is Monday, default screen is 266 and default state of the meters is half full. Global elements are briefly hidden while the game loads.

    • saveSettings

      public static void saveSettings()
      Saves the settings. Saves music and sound options.

    • loadSettings

      public static void loadSettings()
      Loads the settings. The default setting for music and sounds is on.

    • resetProgress

      public static void resetProgress()
      Resets the game's progress. Settings are not reset.

    • loadContinueUnlock

      public static void loadContinueUnlock()
      Loads whether there is an old save already. Default is false.

    • saveContinueUnlock

      public static void saveContinueUnlock()
      Saves whether there is an old save already.
